Title: Relates to state assistance for eligible cities and eligible municipalities with a video lottery gaming facility
Summary: Relates to state assistance for eligible cities and eligible municipalities with a video lottery gaming facility; includes new criteria for newly eligible municipalities.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to state assistance for eligible cities and eligible municipalities with a video lottery gaming facility
